When a raw Tensor is passed to forward it is wrapped in a Variable with requires_grad=False (since it is most likely data); if you do want gradient on the input data you could explicitly construct a Variable holding your data and pass it to forward.

body: Rather than changing the forward method to always accept Tensors, I was suggesting that it accept both Variables and Tensors. When a raw Tensor is passed to forward it is wrapped in a Variable with `requires_grad=False` (since it is most likely data); if you do want gradient on the input data you could explicitly construct a Variable holding your data and pass it to forward.
